item.title: Version 1.9.29
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.29

What’s New

More Reliable Templates

Templates now work consistently every time. We’ve fixed the issues that caused unpredictable results, so you can trust your saved templates to produce the same output regardless of file type or AI model.

Better Cost Tracking for BYOK Users

• See detailed breakdowns of input and output token costs • Real-time cost estimates that match your actual usage • Improved logging to help you understand and optimize API costs

What’s Fixed

Separator Selection Works Properly

The space separator now works correctly. Previously, selecting space would incorrectly switch to underscore. All separator options (space, period, hyphen, underscore) now function as expected.

Accurate Token Usage Tracking

Fixed an issue where token usage was being counted twice. Your usage statistics now show accurate numbers.

Improved AI Response Handling

• Removed outdated features that were causing inconsistent results • Better parsing of AI responses for more reliable filename generation • Enhanced error handling when AI models return unexpected formats

Performance Improvements

Faster File Processing

• More efficient handling of large files and images • Reduced token usage while maintaining quality • Better memory management during batch operations

More Stable AI Services

• Improved error handling across all AI providers (OpenAI, Gemini, Ollama) • Better retry logic for temporary API failures • Enhanced logging for easier troubleshooting

This update focuses on reliability and consistency across the board. Your workflows should be more predictable and efficient.
